data.eml:eml: New feather mites of the subfamily Pterodectinae (Acariformes: Proctophyllodidae) from passerines (Aves: Passeriformes) from Chile and Cuba

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mironov, Sergey, González-Acuña, Daniel (2011): New feather mites of the subfamily Pterodectinae (Acariformes: Proctophyllodidae) from passerines (Aves: Passeriformes) from Chile and Cuba. Zootaxa 3057: 1-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203166
